data.title: Balmoral Castle
data.meta_description: Balmoral castle, Scottish castle, accommodation & cottage holidays in Scotland. Fly fishing, home of the Queen, holiday cottages, days out in Grampian, great castle estate and holidays in Scotland.
data.text:
Availability

Our properties are available for weekly rentals, with certain weeks during The Royal Visit and have weekend changeovers.

Choose from Connachat Cottage, Garbh Allt Shiel, Karim Cottage, Knocks Cottage, Rhebreck Lodge, Sterinbeg and Tigh Na Garaidh.

VIEW DETAILS

Connachat Cottage

This property is located approximately three miles West of the Castle and is set in a secluded location.

The property provides accommodation for up to six people (eight using the sofa bed). Visit Scotland 4 star self catering award.

VIEW DETAILS

Garbh Allt Shiel

This property is located on a scenic location about five miles West of the Castle, near the Old Brig O' Dee.

The property provides accommodation for up to seven people (eight using the trundle bed). Visit Scotland 4 star self catering award.

VIEW DETAILS

Karim Cottage

This property is located in the grounds of Balmoral, near the Castle, the beautiful gardens and Estates Office.

The property provides accommodation for up to six people (eight using the day beds). Visit Scotland 4 star self catering award.

VIEW DETAILS

Knocks Cottage

This property is located in a quiet setting about a mile from Ballater.

Knocks Cottage provides accommodation up to six people (seven using the futon). This is a privately owned property and Balmoral Estates act as the booking agent for this property.

VIEW DETAILS

Rhebreck Lodge

This property is located in the grounds of Balmoral, overlooking the golf course across to Crathie Church.

Rhebreck Lodge provides accommodation for up to six people (seven using the day bed). Visit Scotland 4 star self catering award.

VIEW DETAILS

Sterinbeg Cottage

This property is situated in a secluded location in the Glen Muick area, just a short drive from Ballater.

Sterinbeg Cottage provides accommodation for up to six people and has a wonderful enclosed garden with patio seating area.

VIEW DETAILS

Tigh Na Garaidh Cottage

This property is situated in a quiet location in the gardens of Balmoral Castle.

Tigh Na Garaidh Cottage provides accommodation for up to four people and has a wonderful enclosed garden, overlooking the conservatories.

VIEW DETAILS

Pets welcome

Dogs are welcome in the holiday cottages at Balmoral and during your stay you can enjoy the wonderful walks in the grounds of Balmoral.

There is a charge of Â£15 per pet per week and we request that dogs are kept on a lead and you clean up after your pet.

MORE DETAILS
